entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Shelburne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:58 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Shelburne

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.0°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain near midnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:52 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:52 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 in the evening. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:52 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High zero. Forecast issued 11:52 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
